title: Past Simple vs. Past Continuous Quiz

questions.prompt: Complete the sentence: 'Last night, while I _______ (watch) TV, the phone _______ (ring).'
Complete the sentence: 'She _______ (study) when the lights _______ (go) out.'
Complete the sentence: 'Yesterday at this time, they _______ (have) dinner.'
Complete the sentence: 'He _______ (read) a book while she _______ (cook) dinner.'
Complete the sentence: 'When I _______ (arrive) at the party, everyone _______ (dance).'
Complete the sentence: 'While they _______ (play) in the park, it _______ (start) to rain.'
Complete the sentence: 'He _______ (work) late at the office when the phone _______ (ring).'
Complete the sentence: 'At 3 PM yesterday, I _______ (do) my homework.'
Complete the sentence: 'She _______ (walk) her dog while it _______ (rain).'
Complete the sentence: 'When the accident _______ (happen), I _______ (drive) to work.'
Complete the sentence: 'She _______ (study) while he _______ (watch) TV.'
Complete the sentence: 'We _______ (have) dinner when the guests _______ (arrive).'
Complete the sentence: 'Last night, while we _______ (watch) a movie, the power _______ (go) out.'
Complete the sentence: 'While she _______ (cook) dinner, he _______ (clean) the living room.'
